pages.text: Thumma 'Anzala `Alaykum Min Ba`di Al-Ghammi 'Amanatan Nu`asaan Yaghsha Ta'ifatan Minkum Wa Ta'ifatun Qad 'Ahammat/hum 'Anfusuhum Yazunnuna Billahi Ghayra Al-Haqqi Zanna Al-Jahiliyati Yaquluna Hal Lana Mina Al-'Amri Min Shay'in Qul 'Inna Al-'Amra Kullahu Lillahi Yukhfuna Fi 'Anfusihim Ma La Yubduna Laka Yaquluna Law Kana Lana Mina Al-'Amri Shay'un Ma Qutilna Hahuna Qul Law Kuntum Fi Buyutikum Labaraza Al-Ladhina Kutiba `Alayhimu Al-Qatlu 'Ila Mađaji`ihim Wa Liyabtaliya Allahu Ma Fi Sudurikum Wa Liyumahhisa Ma Fi Qulubikum Wa Allahu `Alimun Bidhati As-Suduri
Inna Al-Ladhina Tawallaw Minkum Yawma At-Taqa Al-Jam`ani 'Innama Astazallahumu Ash-Shaytanu Biba`đi Ma Kasabu Wa Laqad `Afa Allahu `Anhum 'Inna Allaha Ghafurun Halimun

Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu La Takunu Kalladhina Kafaru Wa Qalu Li'khwanihim 'Idha Đarabu Fi Al-'Arđi 'Aw Kanu Ghuzzaan Law Kanu `Indana Ma Matu Wa Ma Qutilu Liyaj`ala Allahu Dhalika Hasratan Fi Qulubihim Wa Allahu Yuhyi Wa Yumitu Wa Allahu Bima Ta`maluna Basirun
Wa La'in Qutiltum Fi Sabili Allahi 'Aw Muttum Lamaghfiratun Mina Allahi Wa Rahmatun Khayrun Mimma Yajma`una
